name: Night Time Walk
description:
*Flash Warning* it is nothing too major however due to the nature of bipsi animation the screen is alittle flashy.

A small game made in Bipsi where you go on a walk to look at the stars.

Thanks & Inspirations!

  • Big thanks to my friend Nico for alot of the scripting and plugin help
  • some of the visuals where inspired by Onion's bitsy
  • And thank you for playing
